DOC.brief_summary: Patients subject simultaneous intracranial lumbar puncture pressure measurement . This study focus intracranial pulse amplitude . Hypothesis : Intracranial pressure amplitude reflect lumbar puncture pressure amplitude .
DOC.brief_title: Intracranial Pressure Waves Via Lumbar Puncture
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Idiopathic Normal Pressure Hydrocephalus Known cause hydrocephalus
